a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: COâ‚‚ emissions per capita vs. fossil fuel consumption per capita, 2023
Fossil fuel consumption is measured as the average consumption of energy from coal, oil and gas per person.

Fossil fuel and industry emissions
are included. Land-use change emissions are not included.
Per capita energy from fossil fuels (kilowatt-hours)
Data source: Global Carbon Budget (2024) and other sources
